tournament.name: 2ยบ LPL Open - Season V - Liga Paulista Legacy

decks.notes: The key strategy of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and then bring them back into play using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo from being interrupted. The combination of aggressive creatures and graveyard recursion allows for explosive plays that can overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this Legacy Aggro-Goblins deck is to flood the board with aggressive Goblin creatures like Battle Cry Goblin, Broadside Bombardiers, and Goblin Rabblemaster, supported by cards like Goblin Warchief and Muxus, Goblin Grandee to pump them up and provide card advantage. With mana acceleration from cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Skirk Prospector, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with hasty creatures and deal damage quickly. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Shatterskull Smashing and Goblin Trashmaster to maintain board control and pressure the opponent.

This Legacy deck focuses on using equipment and artifact synergies to create explosive turns, quickly equipping creatures with Colossus Hammer and other powerful equipment to deal massive damage in a short amount of time. With key cards like Puresteel Paladin, Stoneforge Mystic, and Sigarda's Aid to streamline the equipment-attaching process, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and lethal combo. The potent combination of cards like Colossus Hammer, Puresteel Paladin, and Urza's Saga make this deck a formidable force in the Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on assembling various combos to win the game quickly and efficiently. It uses cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to generate advantage and disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck is able to tutor key pieces using cards like Goblin Engineer and Urza's Saga, while also having ways to control the board using cards like Ensnaring Bridge and Shadowspear. The main win conditions include assembling infinite combos with cards like Phyrexian Devourer and Walking Ballista, or overwhelming opponents with large creatures like Chaos Defiler and Broadside Bombardiers.

The main focus of this Grixis Aggro deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler while disrupting their game plan with counterspells like Daze and Force of Will. The deck also utilizes card selection and manipulation with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the necessary threats and answers. By efficiently managing resources and maintaining a proactive game plan, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory in a Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This aggro Maverick deck focuses on utilizing creatures with utility abilities like Green Sun's Zenith and Knight of the Reliquary to control the board and disrupt opponents. With a mix of powerful threats like Grist, the Hunger Tide and efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game. By utilizing mana dorks like Noble Hierarch and mana fixing lands like Gaea's Cradle, the deck can efficiently ramp and outvalue opponents while disrupting their game plan with cards like Bojuka Bog and Wasteland.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures such as Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats early in the game. With a combination of disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Grief to disrupt the opponent's strategy, this deck aims to win the game through a quick and explosive combo strategy, establishing a dominant board presence and finishing the game before the opponent has a chance to recover.
